translated: The Corythosaure (or Corythosaurus) was a herbivorous dinosaur biped / quadruped that weighed about 4 tons, it measured 10 meters from nose to tail, he had a toothless beak.
original: Le Corythosaure (ou Corythosaurus) était un dinosaure herbivore bipède/quadrupède qui pesait environ 4 tonnes, il mesurait 10 mètres du nez à la queue, il avait un bec sans dents.
